pkgmetadata.longdescription: robotpy-halsim-ds-socket==================Installing this package will allow you to utilize the 2020+ WPILib GUIDS Socket from a RobotPy program.Usage-----First, install pyfrc. Then run your robot with the 'sim' argument and --ds-socket flag: # Windows py -3 ./robot.py sim --ds-socket # Linux/OSX python3 robot.py sim --ds-socketWPILib's documentation for using the simulator can be found at http://docs.wpilib.org/en/latest/docs/software/wpilib-tools/robot-simulation/
